champ_0020_rival_02:
Came to see this Gym, huh? That can only mean
one thing...[npcn:4]
champ_0020_rival_03:
You’re out to earn some Gym Badges and take
on the Pokémon League, aren’t you?![npcn:4]
champ_0020_rival_04: Yesss! I knew it! I’m so glad I asked you to do it![npcn:4]
champ_0020_rival_05:
Yeah, sure you’re not! Just came to the Gym for
some sight-seeing, right? Hah! You fibber![npcn:4]
champ_0020_rival_06:
Before you can battle the Gym Leader, you’ve
gotta pass a certain challenge set by them—\r
their Gym Test.[npcn:4]
champ_0020_rival_07:
Every Gym’s test is different. If you ask the lobby
staff about it, they’ll tell you what’s up![npcn:4]
champ_0020_rival_11:
Here, have these! When you use ’em, consider it
me healing up your Pokémon![npcn:4]
champ_0020_rival_08:
Ahhh, I’m so glad you’re aiming to be a
Champion, too! This is the best news ever![npcn:4]
champ_0020_rival_09: Man, I’m so excited, I can barely stand still...[npcn:4]
champ_0020_rival_10: Guess I’ll just go battle every Trainer I run into![npcn:4]
